projects.title: Airplane Above
projects.description: This project shows the closest aircraft to your location. It uses the OpenSky API to get the aircraft data.

projects.title: Wes's Cozy Kitchen
projects.description: A single player breakfast ingredient choosing game developed using pygame featuring a retro theme and chill gameplay with a focus on the player's choice of ingredients and how they affect the breakfast meal chosen by the Chef.

projects.description: This is a brief description of Project Three.

projects.title: Hexclock
projects.description: Created a hexclock that changes the background color based on the time of day.
